# unspecialized

**Type Property**

Defers assigning the color write mask.

## Declaration

```swift
static var unspecialized: MTLColorWriteMask { get }
```

## Discussion

Until you specialize this value in the pipeline state, it behaves as `MTLColorWriteMaskAll`.
title: unspecialized
